map.title: Knowledge Map
map.subtitle: A complete overview of all categories, subcategories, and topics

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your preferences at any time.
banner.closeWarning: Closing without making a choice will reject all non-essential cookies.

settings.title: Cookie Preferences
settings.description: Choose which cookies you want to allow. You can change these settings at any time from the footer.
settings.closeWarning: Closing without saving will be treated as rejecting all non-essential cookies.

necessary.name: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

functional.name: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies remember your preferences and settings, such as language selection and theme, to provide you with a more personalized experience.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website by collecting and reporting anonymous information. This helps us improve the website's performance and user experience.

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites and display personalized advertisements. They help us measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

topSites.title: Top Sites
topSites.subtitle: Curated list of the best websites for each topic
topSites.selectTopic: Select a topic to see top sites
topSites.noLinks: No sites available for this topic yet

meta.title: Top Spiritual & Esoteric Websites - Oxyness
meta.description: Discover the best spiritual and esoteric websites, carefully curated and ranked by topic. Find trusted resources for meditation, metaphysics, divination, energy healing, and more.

advisors.title: Spiritual Advisors
advisors.subtitle: Discover trusted spiritual advisors and psychics from around the world
advisors.noResultsMessage: Try adjusting your search criteria or check back later

meta.title: Spiritual Topics | Oxyness
meta.description: Explore spiritual and esoteric topics across Absolute, Metaphysics, Spirituality, and Esotericism. Discover practices, philosophies, and traditions.

hero.title: Explore Spiritual Topics
hero.description: Dive deep into the world of spirituality, metaphysics, and esoteric wisdom. Browse through our comprehensive collection of topics organized by category.

hub.title: Explore Spiritual Topics
hub.subtitle: Dive deep into the world of spirituality, metaphysics, and esoteric wisdom. Browse through our comprehensive collection of topics organized by category.

translations.name: Esotericism
translations.description: Explore esoteric traditions, hidden knowledge, and mystical practices.

translations.name: Divination
translations.description: Exploring divination systems including Tarot, I Ching, Runes, and other methods of accessing hidden knowledge.

translations.name: Energy Healing
translations.description: Understanding subtle energies and techniques for healing including Reiki, pranic healing, and crystal therapy.

translations.name: Occultism & Secret Traditions
translations.description: Delving into the hidden teachings of secret societies and occult traditions throughout history.

translations.name: Shamanic Practices
translations.description: Ancient shamanic techniques for journeying, healing, and connecting with spirit realms.

translations.name: Modern Esoteric Techniques
translations.description: Contemporary applications of esoteric wisdom including chaos magic, ceremonial practices, and psychic development.
